meanings.definition: A past tense and past participle of 'shape'.
meanings.sent1: The artist admired the shope of the sculpture.
meanings.sent2: The shope of the vase was elegant and unique.
meanings.sent3: The shope of the clouds resembled fluffy cotton candy.
meanings.sent4: Her dance had the shope of a graceful swan gliding on water.
meanings.sent5: The shope of the mountain against the sunset was breathtaking.

meanings.sent1: We visited the local shope to buy groceries.
meanings.sent2: The shope on the corner sells handmade crafts.
meanings.sent3: The little shope had a sign that said 'Open for business'.
meanings.sent4: The antique shope was filled with treasures from the past.
meanings.sent5: The shope was bustling with customers looking for bargains.
